alert.note: Alert for Denton; Palo Pinto; Parker; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 13 at 1:51PM CST until January 14 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 8 above zero. * WHERE...Denton, Stephens, Palo Pinto and Parker Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold temperatures will become life threatening to people and animals outdoors without proper warmth and shelter. Damage to plumbing is possible if pipes are not properly drained or insulated. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
